text:
A children's book about the life of late Tejano superstar Selena Quintanilla has now been released.

The bilingual book is titled " ." It follows Selena's career as she earns the title "Queen of Tejano Music" and tells young readers about her favorite food and how she loved her family and friends.

The book was written by Patty Rodriguez and Ariana Stein and is part of their Lil' Libros series. The pair decided to start Lil' Libros, a bilingual Spanish and English children's book publishing company, after Rodriguez was unable to find bilingual books she could read to her baby.



to find out more.
